name: winter WONDERLAND (noodletree)
description:
A fun game focused on game feel and DOPENESS, this was entirely  made in 48 hours for the YogsCast Game Jam with a Festive theme and a Surprise theme, would go into detail about it but that makes it less surprising :/

by me (Kane), Sam Holmes and Luca Austin. 

Environment and functions - Kane

Original Soundtrack, SFX and Functions - Sam

Environment models - Luca

-The Noodle Tree Games-
